title: Nagaland to welcome its first 5-star properties through Hotel Polo Towers Group and government partnership
description: Hotel Polo Towers Group is a hospitality group with a strong presence in the Northeast. The group currently has nine operational hotels and five in development. The agreement encompasses the development of a 5-star hotel with a mall in Dimapur and a 5-star hotel in Kohima. The projects include more than 200 extravagant rooms across both hotels. The approximate direct and indirect investment in these projects is estimated at 150 crore.
